channel.title: Installation on Atom-Haskell
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on Atom-Haskell

item.title: Installing binary dependencies
item.description: Supported ghc-mod versions are 5.6. and up. These instructions assume you want to use stylish-haskell as a prettifier. If you would like to use hindent or brittany instead, substitute that in place of stylish-haskell below. Bear in mind that prettifier has to be able to work as a unix filter, i.e. accept input on STDIN and return output on STDOUT. With stack The most reliable way to build these executable binaries is to use stack install.
